splash.title: Rozua Point & Legacy
splash.subtitle: Where heritage finds its history.
splash.description1: In an ephemeral world, Rozua Point & Legacy S.A. stands as a bastion of permanence. We are not merely an investment firm; we are custodians of fine living and architects of family legacies.
splash.description2: Born from the union of a select society of investors, our firm was conceived under an unbreakable premise: true luxury does not shout, it whispers.

items.title: Real Estate
items.subtitle: Walls that have seen history pass.

winesPage.title: Wines
winesPage.intro1: At Rozua Point & Legacy, we see wine as a liquid testament. Each bottle is a chapter written by the earth, the climate, and time.
winesPage.intro2: Our enological division accesses legendary vineyards, cellars closed to the public, and limited productions reserved for collectors and patrimonial funds.

services.title: Curation of Iconic Wines
services.description: Selection of Grands Crus, limited editions, and historic vintages previously verified by experts.

services.title: Enological Investment Funds
services.description: Financial structures that allow investment in wines that increase in value over time. Diversification, authenticity certification, and professional storage.

services.title: Access to Exclusive Wineries
services.description: Private experiences in emblematic vineyards and meetings with world-renowned winemakers.

services.title: Collection Management and Custody
services.description: Protection of the collection's value through specialized storage and maturation analysis.

automobilesPage.title: Automobiles
automobilesPage.intro1: The automobiles we select transcend their function. They are moving sculptures, symbols of mechanical heritages that will not be repeated.
automobilesPage.intro2: Each piece has been examined by specialized engineers and automotive history curators to ensure its impeccable condition and lineage.

services.title: Acquisition of Classic Vehicles
services.description: Access to iconic models: Ferrari Dino, Mercedes 300SL, Porsche 356, Aston Martin DB4, and limited editions.

services.title: Authenticity Certification
services.description: Audited history, verified origin, and complete traceability of the vehicle to guarantee its provenance and value.

services.title: High-Heritage Restorations
services.description: Restorations faithful to the original, carried out by internationally recognized specialists and artisans.

services.title: Automotive Portfolio Management
services.description: Models strategically selected for their future appreciation potential, exclusivity, and historical significance.

realEstatePage.title: Real Estate
realEstatePage.hero: Walls that have seen history pass.
realEstatePage.intro1: The true value of a property is not found in its square meters, but in its soul.
realEstatePage.intro2: We select properties that have stood for generations: restored palaces, penthouses with history, and centenary estates where every wall tells a legacy.

services.title: Acquisition of Properties with Character
services.description: Selection of unique palaces, estates, and residences, not available on the traditional market.

services.title: Architectural and Heritage Audit
services.description: Structural verification, historical authenticity, and restoration potential to ensure long-term value.

services.title: Restoration with Artisans
services.description: Restoration and modernization projects executed by certified artisans in architectural heritage.

services.title: Long-Term Management and Revaluation
services.description: Value preservation strategies based on exclusivity, location, and architectural rarity.

foundersPage.title: Founders
foundersPage.hero: Where engineering and architecture build a legacy.
foundersPage.intro1: Rozua Point & Legacy is born from the meeting of two complementary visions: engineering applied to heritage and architecture dedicated to excellence.
foundersPage.intro2: Our founders represent two essential currents: technical precision and structural aesthetics. Together, they have shaped a firm that not only invests, but preserves legacy.

founders.name: Daniel Beniamino Rozúa
founders.title: Automotive & Electronics Engineer
founders.description: With a solid background in automotive engineering and precision electronics, Daniel brings the technical vision that defines our mechanical acquisitions to the firm. His approach combines performance, reliability, and tradition, essential attributes in prestigious automobiles and collector's assets.

founders.name: Clément Lafayette
founders.title: BIM Architecture Specialist
founders.description: A specialist in BIM architecture and heritage management, Clément provides a key structural and aesthetic perspective for the selection of properties with character. His European sensibility for design and historical preservation strengthens our commitment to properties that transcend generations.

directionPage.title: Direction
directionPage.intro1: Rozua Point & Legacy is built on an international management structure, composed of professionals who represent the integrity, discretion, and long-term vision that defines our firm.
directionPage.intro2: Each region operates under the highest standards of financial governance and curation of patrimonial assets.
directionPage.mapCta: Hover over a region to view details.

regions.title: South America
regions.description: Responsible for patrimonial expansion in high-value emerging markets, they lead the automotive, real estate, and viticultural operations in South America. Their approach combines technical precision, strategic vision, and deep knowledge of the regional heritage.

regions.title: North America
regions.description: With decades of experience in North American markets, Victoria Spencer & Associates offer impeccable management, focused on exclusive assets, certified historic properties, and high-value private collections.

regions.title: Europe
regions.description: Strategic partners on the European continent, Knight Frank S.A. leads in patrimonial consulting for historic real estate and exclusive assets. Their unblemished reputation and global presence position them as ideal custodians of the world's most demanding markets.

governancePage.title: Corporate Governance
governancePage.intro: The structure of Rozua Point & Legacy is based on governance principles that ensure the alignment of interests, prudent risk management, and an unwavering commitment to protecting our clients' assets. Our vision is not just to invest, but to guard and enhance legacies.

principles.title: Unbreakable Ethical Code
principles.description: Our operations are governed by a code of conduct that prioritizes integrity, honesty, and transparency. Every decision, from acquiring an asset to communicating with a client, is subject to the highest ethical standards.

principles.title: Long-Term Legacy Vision
principles.description: We do not seek ephemeral returns. Our investment and management strategy is based on the preservation and growth of capital across generations, ensuring that the heritage endures over time.

principles.title: Commitment to Excellence
principles.description: Excellence is the norm, not the exception. From the curation of our assets to customer service, we are committed to delivering superlative quality in every facet of our firm.

principles.title: Confidentiality as a Pillar
principles.description: Our clients' privacy is sacred. We implement rigorous security measures and discretion protocols to ensure that all interactions and data are handled with the utmost confidentiality.

governancePage.supervisionText: Although the composition of our board and investment committee is private, its structure is designed to ensure independent supervision, collegial decision-making, and constant auditing of processes. The interests of our clients are and will always be our top priority.

faqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqPage.intro: Below, we answer some of the most common questions about our firm, our principles, and our work method.

faqs.question: What investment areas does Rozua Point & Legacy specialize in?
faqs.answer: Our firm focuses on three pillars of patrimonial investment: collectible wines and unique vintages; iconic and limited-production automobiles; and real estate with historical and architectural value. Each area is managed by dedicated curators and specialists.

faqs.question: How do you guarantee client confidentiality?
faqs.answer: Discretion is the foundation of our firm. All client communication and information are treated under the strictest confidentiality protocols. We do not share data with third parties and use secure platforms for all interactions.

faqs.question: What kind of treatment can I expect as a client?
faqs.answer: We offer a direct and personalized service. Each client is assigned to a firm director, who acts as a single point of contact to ensure fluid communication, a deep understanding of your objectives, and flawless execution.

faqs.question: How can I start a conversation with the firm?
faqs.answer: To initiate a consultation, we invite you to use our form in the 'Private Contact' section. One of our directors will review your request and get in touch to coordinate a private video conference on the platform of your choice.

faqs.question: Do you invest in traditional financial assets?
faqs.answer: No. Our focus is exclusively on tangible and passion assets with long-term revaluation potential. We believe in the value of legacy, history, and craftsmanship as pillars of a solid patrimonial portfolio.

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.intro: At Rozua Point & Legacy, the confidentiality and protection of your data are fundamental pillars of our relationship. This policy describes how your personal information is collected, used, and protected.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content: We only collect the information necessary to establish contact and understand your investment interests, as requested in our private contact form. This may include your name, email, country, and interests. We do not automatically collect sensitive data.

sections.title: Use of Information
sections.content: Your information is used exclusively for professional communication purposes. This includes responding to your inquiries, coordinating meetings, and providing relevant information about our areas of expertise. We will never sell, rent, or share your personal information with unauthorized third parties.

sections.title: Security and Confidentiality
sections.content: We implement reasonable technical and organizational security measures to protect your information against unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure. Communication is handled through secure channels and access to your data is restricted to authorized management personnel.

sections.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
sections.content: Our website uses essential cookies to enhance your browsing experience, such as maintaining your theme preferences (light/dark). We do not use tracking cookies for advertising purposes nor do we share browsing data with third parties for such purposes.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.content: You have the right to request access, rectification, or deletion of your personal data held by us. To exercise these rights, please contact us through the established communication channels.

sections.title: Changes to the Policy
sections.content: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page and will take effect immediately.
